channel.title: CVE Feed for appleple inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for appleple inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-21142|2024-08-03T02:31:59.241Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms
item.description: Authentication bypass vulnerability in a-blog cms Ver.2.8.x series versions prior to Ver.2.8.74, Ver.2.9.x series versions prior to Ver.2.9.39, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.43, and Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.41 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication under the specific condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-23916|2024-08-03T03:59:22.651Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in a-blog cms Ver.2.8.x series versions prior to Ver.2.8.75, Ver.2.9.x series versions prior to Ver.2.9.40, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.44, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.42, and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors. This vulnerability is different from CVE-2022-24374.

item.title: CVE-2022-24374|2024-08-03T04:07:02.425Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in a-blog cms Ver.2.8.x series versions prior to Ver.2.8.75, Ver.2.9.x series versions prior to Ver.2.9.40, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.44, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.42, and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors. This vulnerability is different from CVE-2022-23916.

item.title: CVE-2022-23810|2024-08-03T03:51:45.982Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms
item.description: Template injection (Improper Neutralization of Special Elements Used in a Template Engine) vulnerability in a-blog cms Ver.2.8.x series versions prior to Ver.2.8.75, Ver.2.9.x series versions prior to Ver.2.9.40, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.44, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.42, and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain an arbitrary file on the server via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-31394|2024-08-02T01:52:56.577Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12, Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.61, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.53, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an editor or higher privilege who can log in to the product may obtain arbitrary files on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-30420|2024-08-02T01:32:07.390Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12 and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an administrator or higher privilege who can log in to the product may obtain arbitrary files on the server and information on the internal server that is not disclosed to the public.

item.title: CVE-2024-30419|2024-08-02T01:32:07.430Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12, Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.61, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.53, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with a contributor or higher privilege who can log in to the product may execute an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who accessed the website using the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-31395|2024-08-02T01:52:56.829Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12, Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.61, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.53, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an editor or higher privilege who can log in to the product may execute an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who accessed the schedule management page.

item.title: CVE-2024-31396|2024-08-02T01:52:56.923Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Code injection vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12 and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an administrator or higher privilege who can log in to the product may execute an arbitrary command on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-27279|2024-03-12T08:19:48.705Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series Ver.3.1.9 and earlier, Ver.3.0.x series Ver.3.0.30 and earlier, Ver.2.11.x series Ver.2.11.59 and earlier, Ver.2.10.x series Ver.2.10.51 and earlier, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with editor or higher privilege who can login to the product may obtain arbitrary files on the server including password files.

item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12, Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.61, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.53, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12 and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32. item.title: CVE-2024-25559|2024-02-15T04:32:37.608Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms
item.description: URL spoofing vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.0 to Ver.3.1.8. If an attacker sends a specially crafted request, the administrator of the product may be forced to access an arbitrary website when clicking a link in the audit log.

item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series Ver.3.1.9 and earlier, Ver.3.0.x series Ver.3.0.30 and earlier, Ver.2.11.x series Ver.2.11.59 and earlier, Ver.2.10.x series Ver.2.10.51 and earlier, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions.
